entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1700 metres rising to 2200 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries overnight. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1700 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
